description.full: Experience chess like never before in this intense 3D tabletop experience. Play against opponents of any skill level in a variety of settings such as at the top of a skyscraper, inside of a beachfront cabana, or even in moving vehicles such as a jet ski, motorcycle, or a commuter airplane. Move up the ranks and across the world as you unravel the ancient secrets of the goddess of chess herself in this riveting and unforgettable chess adventure.
